title: ulaginum periyavanE
sahitya:
ulaginum periyavanE mahAtmA gAndhi uyirinum ariyavanE mahAtmanE


anupallavi

  kalakamillAmal oru kulamena bhuvi vAzhak-karuNaik-kaDalAi vandAi maraNa bhayamum venrAi


caraNam 1    kattiyillAmal Atma shaktik-kanalinAl kaLI naghai porumaiyAl kaDum tava vratattAl
sattiyAgraham enum samaya sanjIviyAl tandanai sutantaram indiyat-tandaiyE
    caraNam 2    aravali koNDu nI maravaliyai venrAi anbup-podu nalattAl amaranAi ninrAi
iravum unakkuNDO idayak-kOyilil vaittE ellArum kumbiDum Ezhaip-pangALanE
